post.author: Admin
post.title: Munching for Music!
post.description:
Hello Band Families!
Tired of cooking? Need to get out of the house for a while? Have a few hungry
post.content:
Hello Band Families!

Tired of cooking? Need to get out of the house for a while? Have a few hungry teenagers in the house?

Well, the Munching for Music committee has a dinner choice for you and a fundraiser for our band!

  • When: MONDAY, February 20
  • Where: Five Guys, Strongsville (new location on Pearl just south of Royalton Rd)
  • Time: 5 – 8pm

Bring your family, tell your friends, and post to social media.

Download the flyer OR just tell them you are with the NORTH ROYALTON HIGH SCHOOL MARCHING BAND!

Thank you for your continued support of our band program.
